Uses of Package
ctlogo.function.drawing

  • Packages that use ctlogo.function.drawing 
    Package Description
    ctlogo.function.drawing
    Drawing functions in CTLogo
  • Classes in ctlogo.function.drawing used by ctlogo.function.drawing 
    Class and Description
    BackwardFunction
    Let the turtle go backward.
    CleanFunction
    Clean the screen, without affecting the state of turtle
    ClearScreenFunction
    Clean the screen, reseting the orientation and position of turtle
    ForwardFunction
    Let the turtle go forward.
    HideTurtleFunction
    Put pen down (so that the turtle draws shapes).
    LeftFunction
    Let the turtle turn left
    PendownFunction
    Put pen down (so that the turtle draws shapes).
    PenupFunction
    Put pen up (so that the turtle does not draw shapes).
    RightFunction
    Let the turtle turn right.
    SetxFunction
    Change the X-coordinate of the turtle.
    SetxyFunction
    Change the coordination of the turtle.
    SetyFunction
    Change the Y-coordinate of the turtle.
    ShowTurtleFunction
    Put pen down (so that the turtle draws shapes).
    XcorFunction
    Query the X-coordinate of the turtle.
    YcorFunction
    Query the Y-coordinate of the turtle.
